name: Frost Armory
description: instantly applies the Frost Armor effect to you and one nearby group member for each Ice in your Ice Stores, emptying them in the process. Frost Armor adds 3500 Armor and lasts until you zone or until you take damage and then up to 15 seconds after the damage. Each hit adds one Frost Armor Crack counter (one per 0.5 seconds max) and the effect ends if you are hit after your third Frost Armor Crack.
